scripts.build: npm run --workspace=libs build && npm run --workspace=rooms build && npm run --workspace=conf build && npm run --workspace=clients build
scripts.package: npm run --workspace=rooms/rooms-server package && npm run --workspace=conf/conf-server package
scripts.deploy: rm -rf deploy && mkdir -p deploy && npm run build && npm run package && npm run deploy-rooms && npm run deploy-conf && npm run deploy-client
scripts.build-libs: npm run --workspace=libs build && npm run --workspace=shared build && npm run --workspace=rooms/rooms-client build && npm run --workspace=conf/conf-client build
scripts.start: concurrently --kill-others-on-fail "npm run start --workspace=rooms/rooms-server" "npm run start --workspace=conf/conf-server" "npm run start --workspace=client-apps/client-conf-react-app"
